markdown: KBA MARKETING GROUP — 2001 VENUE SPONSORSHIP AGREEMENT THIS VENUE SPONSORSHIP AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") is entered into as of the following Date of Agreement, by and between Kevin Berg & Associates, Inc. d/b/a KBA Marketing Group ("KBA") and the owner ("Abbey Bar, Inc.") of the business establishment ("Abbey") described below. Below are various defined terms for the purposes of this Agreement: Date of Agreement: 2/27/01 Term of Agreement: January 1, 2001 - December 31, 2001 Sponsorship Program: Camel Club Program ("CCP") I. VENUE INFORMATION Venue Name: Abbey Venue Code: 4149 Venue Address: 1123 Decatur Street City / State / Zip Code: New Orleans LA 70116 FEIN or SSN: PERSONAL/CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL REDACTED Venue Owner Name: Abbey Bar, Inc. Venue Owner Category: Corporation II. SPONSORSHIP FUNDS AND EXTRA VALUE ITEMS Total Direct Payments: $ 2,000.00, payable on or before the following payment dates in the following amounts: March 31, 2001: $ 500.00 September 30, 2001: $ 500.00 June 30, 2001: $ 500.00 December 31, 2001: $ 500.00 TOTAL SPONSORSHIP FUNDS: $ 2,000.00 [This amount includes all sub-totals set forth above] KBA will also provide the following Extra Value items at no cost to Venue: Tobacco License Fees: All state and local retail tobacco licensing fees for Venue (if Venue is currently without a license), plus assistance with tobacco licensing application procedures; Bar Essentials: Branded ashtrays, beverage napkins, generic branded matchbooks, and other bar essentials delivered to Venue for use within the Venue, as available, at the discretion of KBA; Custom Matchbooks: 3 cases of custom branded matchbooks that display the Venue's name and logo, delivered to Venue; Flyer Distribution: Public distribution of flyers for Special Events and activities at Venue, at discretion of KBA; Cigarette Delivery: Free delivery of Camel cigarette brand styles (the "Product") purchased by Venue Owner for resale in Venue; Free (Gratis) Product that KBA will distribute in Venue to adult smokers (as permitted by law). <::attestation: Stamp Status: Copy Readable Text: COPY A black, bold, slightly tilted 'COPY' stamp with a horizontal line through it, centered on the image.::> <::attestation: Status indicator ORIGINAL Readable Text: ORIGINAL The word "ORIGINAL" is centrally located, in a bold, distressed, uppercase font.::> - 1 - <::attestation: Initials and Signature Signed Signature: illegible Readable Text: Initials: KBA, Venue Owner Two sets of labels and signatures, horizontally aligned in the center of the image.::> Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/qzlj0226 52579 6714

Below are various defined terms for the purposes of this Agreement:
Date of Agreement: 2/27/01 Term of Agreement: January 1, 2001 - December 31, 2001 Sponsorship Program: Camel Club Program ("CCP")

I. VENUE INFORMATION Venue Name: Abbey Venue Code: 4149 Venue Address: 1123 Decatur Street City / State / Zip Code: New Orleans LA 70116 FEIN or SSN: PERSONAL/CONFIDENTIAL MATERIAL REDACTED Venue Owner Name: Abbey Bar, Inc. Venue Owner Category: Corporation

II. SPONSORSHIP FUNDS AND EXTRA VALUE ITEMS Total Direct Payments: $ 2,000.00, payable on or before the following payment dates in the following amounts: March 31, 2001: $ 500.00 September 30, 2001: $ 500.00 June 30, 2001: $ 500.00 December 31, 2001: $ 500.00 TOTAL SPONSORSHIP FUNDS: $ 2,000.00 [This amount includes all sub-totals set forth above] KBA will also provide the following Extra Value items at no cost to Venue: Tobacco License Fees: All state and local retail tobacco licensing fees for Venue (if Venue is currently without a license), plus assistance with tobacco licensing application procedures; Bar Essentials: Branded ashtrays, beverage napkins, generic branded matchbooks, and other bar essentials delivered to Venue for use within the Venue, as available, at the discretion of KBA; Custom Matchbooks: 3 cases of custom branded matchbooks that display the Venue's name and logo, delivered to Venue; Flyer Distribution: Public distribution of flyers for Special Events and activities at Venue, at discretion of KBA; Cigarette Delivery: Free delivery of Camel cigarette brand styles (the "Product") purchased by Venue Owner for resale in Venue; Free (Gratis) Product that KBA will distribute in Venue to adult smokers (as permitted by law).
<::attestation: Stamp Status: Copy Readable Text: COPY A black, bold, slightly tilted 'COPY' stamp with a horizontal line through it, centered on the image.::>
<::attestation: Status indicator ORIGINAL Readable Text: ORIGINAL The word "ORIGINAL" is centrally located, in a bold, distressed, uppercase font.::>
<::attestation: Initials and Signature Signed Signature: illegible Readable Text: Initials: KBA, Venue Owner Two sets of labels and signatures, horizontally aligned in the center of the image.::>
